readanalogs: Read-Out all 4 analog input values in V (0-10V; 10bit)
normAnalogs: Normalizing 0V to minimum value and 10V to maximum value
normAn1Min: Minimum value for analog input 1 - equals 0V
normAn1Max: Maximum value for analog input 1 - equals 10V
normAn2Min: Minimum value for analog input 2 - equals 0V
normAn2Max: Maximum value for analog input 2 - equals 10V
normAn3Min: Minimum value for analog input 3 - equals 0V
normAn3Max: Maximum value for analog input 3 - equals 10V
normAn4Min: Minimum value for analog input 4 - equals 0V
normAn4Max: Maximum value for analog input 4 - equals 10V
